# Result Output table
```{r table 1, echo=F}
# Load required package
library(knitr)

# Define the table
table_EUNIS_types <- data.frame(
 Time = c("R", "R1A", "R22", "no type"),
 APR25 =  c(0, 48, 48, 0),
 AUG25 = c(100,5 , 2, 13),
  JUNE_26 = c("x", "tba", "tba", "tba"), 
  JUNE_27 = c(0, 3,"tba", "tba"),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

# Display the table
kable(table_EUNIS_types, caption = "Table of Habitat types")
```
